# **Reproducibility**


`r R.version.string` was used with packages: 

```{r pkgs-version, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
pkgs <- c("FactoMineR", "limma")
pkgs_bbc <- c("bbcCorpo", "bbcPreprocessing", 
              "bbcSupervised", "bbcUnsupervised", "bbcUtils", 
              "bbcViz", "bbcWrangling", "bbcVerse")
pkgs <- c(sort(pkgs), sort(pkgs_bbc))

cat(bbcUtils::pkg_version(pkgs, sep = ",\n", and = "",
                          before = "+ ", after = ""), 
    ".\n", sep = "")
```
